net.sourceforge.groboutils.autodoc.v1
Interface AutoDocTP

All Known Implementing Classes:
AutoDocTPSet, LogTP
public interface AutoDocTP

Test Procedure entry point. Generates Test Procedure documentation.

March 16, 2002

$Date: 2003/02/10 22:52:11 $
